name: L35 Big Farm Race
description:
Race Hohoha Monkey, Moo Moo the cow or Ziggy the pig and watch as they run, skip, bounce, dance, and laugh their way past obstacles to the finish line to win the 'Big Farm Race'. Children will learn to distinguish between action and non-action words and understand the use of the verbs 'be', 'have', and 'do' within a sentence. 

Grade: Kindergarten

Subject: Language (English)
Section: Grammar
Lesson: Present Tense Action Words
